alert.note: Alert for Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 22 at 2:48PM CDT until April 24 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Putnam, Schuyler, Sullivan, Adair, Linn MO and Macon Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan
